expert_definitions.medical_ai: A medical AI specialist with expertise in healthcare, medical terminology, clinical research, pharmaceutical knowledge, patient care protocols, medical imaging interpretation, and health-related data analysis.
expert_definitions.legal_advisor: A legal expert specialized in law, regulations, contracts, compliance, legal research, case analysis, legal writing, and providing guidance on legal matters and procedures.
expert_definitions.financial_analyst: A financial expert skilled in investment analysis, market research, financial modeling, risk assessment, economic analysis, trading strategies, and financial planning.
expert_definitions.education_tutor: An educational specialist focused on teaching, curriculum development, learning strategies, academic content creation, student assessment, and pedagogical approaches across various subjects.
expert_definitions.technical_support: A technical support specialist expert in troubleshooting, system administration, network issues, software debugging, hardware problems, and providing clear technical guidance to users.
